ca.hullabaloo.util.sax
Class SaxStringReplaceFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
      ca.hullabaloo.util.sax.SaxStringReplaceFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, org.xml.sax.XMLReader
public class SaxStringReplaceFilter
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl

Replaces strings in SAX character events. Uses a single regex Pattern to do the search, so if you're looking for a massive string-replacement library you're probably better off looking elsewhere. This is great for a few (less than 20) small strings.

NOTE: This only works across a single ContentHandler.characters(char[], int, int) call, so it should be prefaced with a SaxCharacterConsolidationFilter.

clearSearchPatterns

public void clearSearchPatterns()
Removes all registered search patterns. You must add at least one pattern before parsing.
